name: Carlos Sainz
satirical_angle: Latin lover energy, seduced by every team then dumped for a younger model

signature_reactions.defeat: Philosophical. 'Racing, you know? Today was not our day.'
signature_reactions.being_replaced: Graceful exit. 'I gave everything. Now new chapter.'

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: arrives at Williams in full matador outfit

storyline_hooks: Ferrari exile to Williams redemption arc
Can he make Williams great again?
Still bitter about Lewis but too classy to show it

example_dialogue.after_great_race: VAMOS! What a race! The car, the team, everything! Increíble!
example_dialogue.about_ferrari_exit: These things happen. I gave four years, great memories. Now, new chapter.
example_dialogue.about_williams: Williams is a legendary team. I'm here to bring them back. Step by step.
example_dialogue.with_lando: Lando! My friend! How's the golf game? Still terrible? Ha!
